7#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_COMPILER_H_
8#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_COMPILER_H_
9
10//
11// Machine independent part of the compiler private objects
12// sent as ShHandle to the driver.
13//
14// This should not be included by driver code.
15//
16
17#include <GLSLANG/ShaderVars.h>
18
19#include "compiler/translator/BuiltInFunctionEmulator.h"
20#include "compiler/translator/CallDAG.h"
21#include "compiler/translator/Diagnostics.h"
22#include "compiler/translator/ExtensionBehavior.h"
23#include "compiler/translator/HashNames.h"
24#include "compiler/translator/InfoSink.h"
25#include "compiler/translator/Pragma.h"
26#include "compiler/translator/SymbolTable.h"
27#include "compiler/translator/ValidateAST.h"
28#include "third_party/compiler/ArrayBoundsClamper.h"
29
30namespace sh
31{
32
33class TCompiler;
34class TParseContext;
35#ifdef ANGLE_ENABLE_HLSL
36class TranslatorHLSL;
37#endif // ANGLE_ENABLE_HLSL
38#ifdef ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL
39class TranslatorMetalDirect;
40#endif // ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL
41
42//
43// Helper function to check if the shader type is GLSL.
44//
45bool IsGLSL130OrNewer(ShShaderOutput output);
46bool IsGLSL420OrNewer(ShShaderOutput output);
47bool IsGLSL410OrOlder(ShShaderOutput output);
48
49//
50// Helper function to check if the invariant qualifier can be removed.
51//
52bool RemoveInvariant(sh::GLenum shaderType,
53 int shaderVersion,
54 ShShaderOutput outputType,
55 ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
56
57//
58// The base class used to back handles returned to the driver.
59//
60class TShHandleBase
61{
62 public:
63 TShHandleBase();
64 virtual ~TShHandleBase();
65 virtual TCompiler *getAsCompiler() { return 0; }
66#ifdef ANGLE_ENABLE_HLSL
67 virtual TranslatorHLSL *getAsTranslatorHLSL() { return 0; }
68#endif // ANGLE_ENABLE_HLSL
69#ifdef ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL
70 virtual TranslatorMetalDirect *getAsTranslatorMetalDirect() { return nullptr; }
71#endif // ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL
72
73 protected:
74 // Memory allocator. Allocates and tracks memory required by the compiler.
75 // Deallocates all memory when compiler is destructed.
76 angle::PoolAllocator allocator;
77};
78
79//
80// The base class for the machine dependent compiler to derive from
81// for managing object code from the compile.
82//
83class TCompiler : public TShHandleBase
84{
85 public:
86 TCompiler(sh::GLenum type, ShShaderSpec spec, ShShaderOutput output);
87 ~TCompiler() override;
88 TCompiler *getAsCompiler() override { return this; }
89
90 bool Init(const ShBuiltInResources &resources);
91
92 // compileTreeForTesting should be used only when tests require access to
93 // the AST. Users of this function need to manually manage the global pool
94 // allocator. Returns nullptr whenever there are compilation errors.
95 TIntermBlock *compileTreeForTesting(const char *const shaderStrings[],
96 size_t numStrings,
97 ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
98
99 bool compile(const char *const shaderStrings[],
100 size_t numStrings,
101 ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
102
103 // Get results of the last compilation.
104 int getShaderVersion() const { return mShaderVersion; }
105 TInfoSink &getInfoSink() { return mInfoSink; }
106
107 bool isEarlyFragmentTestsSpecified() const { return mEarlyFragmentTestsSpecified; }
108 bool isEarlyFragmentTestsOptimized() const { return mEarlyFragmentTestsOptimized; }
109
110 bool isComputeShaderLocalSizeDeclared() const { return mComputeShaderLocalSizeDeclared; }
111 const sh::WorkGroupSize &getComputeShaderLocalSize() const { return mComputeShaderLocalSize; }
112 int getNumViews() const { return mNumViews; }
113
114 // Clears the results from the previous compilation.
115 void clearResults();
116
117 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getAttributes() const { return mAttributes; }
118 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getOutputVariables() const { return mOutputVariables; }
119 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getUniforms() const { return mUniforms; }
120 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getInputVaryings() const { return mInputVaryings; }
121 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getOutputVaryings() const { return mOutputVaryings; }
122 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getInterfaceBlocks() const { return mInterfaceBlocks; }
123 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getUniformBlocks() const { return mUniformBlocks; }
124 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getShaderStorageBlocks() const
125 {
126 return mShaderStorageBlocks;
127 }
128 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getInBlocks() const { return mInBlocks; }
129
130 ShHashFunction64 getHashFunction() const { return mResources.HashFunction; }
131 NameMap &getNameMap() { return mNameMap; }
132 TSymbolTable &getSymbolTable() { return mSymbolTable; }
133 ShShaderSpec getShaderSpec() const { return mShaderSpec; }
134 ShShaderOutput getOutputType() const { return mOutputType; }
135 const std::string &getBuiltInResourcesString() const { return mBuiltInResourcesString; }
136
137 bool shouldRunLoopAndIndexingValidation(ShCompileOptions compileOptions) const;
138
139 // Get the resources set by InitBuiltInSymbolTable
140 const ShBuiltInResources &getResources() const;
141
142 int getGeometryShaderMaxVertices() const { return mGeometryShaderMaxVertices; }
143 int getGeometryShaderInvocations() const { return mGeometryShaderInvocations; }
144 TLayoutPrimitiveType getGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType() const
145 {
146 return mGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType;
147 }
148 TLayoutPrimitiveType getGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType() const
149 {
150 return mGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType;
151 }
152
153 unsigned int getStructSize(const ShaderVariable &var) const;
154 unsigned int getSharedMemorySize() const;
155
156 sh::GLenum getShaderType() const { return mShaderType; }
157
158 bool validateAST(TIntermNode *root);
159
160 protected:
161 // Add emulated functions to the built-in function emulator.
162 virtual void initBuiltInFunctionEmulator(BuiltInFunctionEmulator *emu,
163 ShCompileOptions compileOptions)
164 {}
165 // Translate to object code. May generate performance warnings through the diagnostics.
166 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD virtual bool translate(TIntermBlock *root,
167 ShCompileOptions compileOptions,
168 PerformanceDiagnostics *perfDiagnostics) = 0;
169 // Get built-in extensions with default behavior.
170 const TExtensionBehavior &getExtensionBehavior() const;
171 const char *getSourcePath() const;
172 const TPragma &getPragma() const { return mPragma; }
173 void writePragma(ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
174 // Relies on collectVariables having been called.
175 bool isVaryingDefined(const char *varyingName);
176
177 const ArrayBoundsClamper &getArrayBoundsClamper() const;
178 ShArrayIndexClampingStrategy getArrayIndexClampingStrategy() const;
179 const BuiltInFunctionEmulator &getBuiltInFunctionEmulator() const;
180
181 virtual bool shouldFlattenPragmaStdglInvariantAll() = 0;
182 virtual bool shouldCollectVariables(ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
183 // If precision emulation needed, set isNeeded to true and emulate precision for given
184 // outputLanguage, returning false if that fails, else returning true.
185 bool emulatePrecisionIfNeeded(TIntermBlock *root,
186 TInfoSinkBase &sink,
187 bool *isNeeded,
188 const ShShaderOutput outputLanguage);
189
190 bool wereVariablesCollected() const;
191 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mAttributes;
192 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mOutputVariables;
193 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mUniforms;
194 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mInputVaryings;
195 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mOutputVaryings;
196 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mSharedVariables;
197 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mInterfaceBlocks;
198 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mUniformBlocks;
199 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mShaderStorageBlocks;
200 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mInBlocks;
201
202 private:
203 // Initialize symbol-table with built-in symbols.
204 bool initBuiltInSymbolTable(const ShBuiltInResources &resources);
205 // Compute the string representation of the built-in resources
206 void setResourceString();
207 // Return false if the call depth is exceeded.
208 bool checkCallDepth();
209 // Insert statements to reference all members in unused uniform blocks with standard and shared
210 // layout. This is to work around a Mac driver that treats unused standard/shared
211 // uniform blocks as inactive.
212 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool useAllMembersInUnusedStandardAndSharedBlocks(TIntermBlock *root);
213 // Insert statements to initialize output variables in the beginning of main().
214 // This is to avoid undefined behaviors.
215 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool initializeOutputVariables(TIntermBlock *root);
216 // Insert gl_Position = vec4(0,0,0,0) to the beginning of main().
217 // It is to work around a Linux driver bug where missing this causes compile failure
218 // while spec says it is allowed.
219 // This function should only be applied to vertex shaders.
220 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool initializeGLPosition(TIntermBlock *root);
221 // Return true if the maximum expression complexity is below the limit.
222 bool limitExpressionComplexity(TIntermBlock *root);
223 // Creates the function call DAG for further analysis, returning false if there is a recursion
224 bool initCallDag(TIntermNode *root);
225 // Return false if "main" doesn't exist
226 bool tagUsedFunctions();
227 void internalTagUsedFunction(size_t index);
228
229 void collectInterfaceBlocks();
230
231 bool mVariablesCollected;
232
233 bool mGLPositionInitialized;
234
235 // Removes unused function declarations and prototypes from the AST
236 class UnusedPredicate;
237 void pruneUnusedFunctions(TIntermBlock *root);
238
239 TIntermBlock *compileTreeImpl(const char *const shaderStrings[],
240 size_t numStrings,
241 const ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
242
243 // Fetches and stores shader metadata that is not stored within the AST itself, such as shader
244 // version.
245 void setASTMetadata(const TParseContext &parseContext);
246
247 // Check if shader version meets the requirement.
248 bool checkShaderVersion(TParseContext *parseContext);
249
250 // Does checks that need to be run after parsing is complete and returns true if they pass.
251 bool checkAndSimplifyAST(TIntermBlock *root,
252 const TParseContext &parseContext,
253 ShCompileOptions compileOptions);
254
255 sh::GLenum mShaderType;
256 ShShaderSpec mShaderSpec;
257 ShShaderOutput mOutputType;
258
259 struct FunctionMetadata
260 {
261 FunctionMetadata() : used(false) {}
262 bool used;
263 };
264
265 CallDAG mCallDag;
266 std::vector<FunctionMetadata> mFunctionMetadata;
267
268 ShBuiltInResources mResources;
269 std::string mBuiltInResourcesString;
270
271 // Built-in symbol table for the given language, spec, and resources.
272 // It is preserved from compile-to-compile.
273 TSymbolTable mSymbolTable;
274 // Built-in extensions with default behavior.
275 TExtensionBehavior mExtensionBehavior;
276
277 ArrayBoundsClamper mArrayBoundsClamper;
278 BuiltInFunctionEmulator mBuiltInFunctionEmulator;
279
280 // Results of compilation.
281 int mShaderVersion;
282 TInfoSink mInfoSink; // Output sink.
283 TDiagnostics mDiagnostics;
284 const char *mSourcePath; // Path of source file or NULL
285
286 // fragment shader early fragment tests
287 bool mEarlyFragmentTestsSpecified;
288 bool mEarlyFragmentTestsOptimized;
289
290 // compute shader local group size
291 bool mComputeShaderLocalSizeDeclared;
292 sh::WorkGroupSize mComputeShaderLocalSize;
293
294 // GL_OVR_multiview num_views.
295 int mNumViews;
296
297 // geometry shader parameters.
298 int mGeometryShaderMaxVertices;
299 int mGeometryShaderInvocations;
300 TLayoutPrimitiveType mGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType;
301 TLayoutPrimitiveType mGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType;
302
303 // name hashing.
304 NameMap mNameMap;
305
306 TPragma mPragma;
307
308 // Track what should be validated given passes currently applied.
309 ValidateASTOptions mValidateASTOptions;
310
311 ShCompileOptions mCompileOptions;
312};
313
314//
315// This is the interface between the machine independent code
316// and the machine dependent code.
317//
318// The machine dependent code should derive from the classes
319// above. Then Construct*() and Delete*() will create and
320// destroy the machine dependent objects, which contain the
321// above machine independent information.
322//
323TCompiler *ConstructCompiler(sh::GLenum type, ShShaderSpec spec, ShShaderOutput output);
324void DeleteCompiler(TCompiler *);
325
326void EmitEarlyFragmentTestsGLSL(const TCompiler &, TInfoSinkBase &sink);
327void EmitWorkGroupSizeGLSL(const TCompiler &, TInfoSinkBase &sink);
328void EmitMultiviewGLSL(const TCompiler &,
329 const ShCompileOptions &,
330 const TExtension,
331 const TBehavior,
332 TInfoSinkBase &sink);
333
334} // namespace sh
335
336#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_COMPILER_H_
337
